definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4
Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 ti3 yu4 chang3

definition: Olympic Organizing Committee/abbr. to 奧組委|奥组委
pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4 Zu3 zhi1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 奧林匹克運動會組織委員會

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: A fire burns in the cauldron, as a reminder of the Olympic flame.
sentences.chinese: 火炬塔裏燃燒着一團火焰，讓人想到奧林匹克聖火。

sentences.english: All rights to the Olympic symbol belong exclusively to the IOC.
sentences.chinese: 奧林匹克標誌的所有權屬國際奧委會專有。

sentences.english: Noble and elegant, the medals are a blending of traditional Chinese culture and Olympism.
sentences.chinese: 高貴而典雅，獎牌是中國傳統文化和奧林匹克的融合。

sentences.english: The Olympic oriflamme is soaring out on the Divine Lands, they're flags of peace and soundness in the Loyal Counties.
sentences.chinese: 神州高揚奧林匹克之旗，赤縣飄飛和平永固之幟。

sentences.english: But I heard that Olympic Marseille is the year's winner of Champions Cup.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說歐洲冠軍盃今年的得主是奧林匹克馬賽隊。

sentences.english: How did you feel as you stepped out of the tunnel at the Stadio Olimpico?
sentences.chinese: 當你走出奧林匹克球場的過道時是什麼感覺？

sentences.english: The summer Olympic games take plays every four years.
sentences.chinese: 奧林匹克在行夏季運動會第四年舉行一次。

sentences.english: One of the speakers put it like the Olympics with the gold circle and the bronze medal.
sentences.chinese: 有人認爲它就像奧林匹克的金牌和銅獎。

sentences.english: But I heard that Olympic Marseille is this year's winner of Champions Cup.
sentences.chinese: 但我聽說歐洲冠軍盃今年的得主是奧林匹克馬賽隊。

sentences.english: She won the gold medal in the women's marathon at the year's Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 在今年的奧林匹克馬拉松婦子比賽中獲得了金牌。

sentences.english: What is the flag and emblem of the Chinese Taipei Olympic Committee?
sentences.chinese: 中國臺北奧林匹克委員會的旗和徽是什麼？

sentences.english: Information on all things Olympic, including logos, mascots, venues, and bid candidates.
sentences.chinese: 所有事情奧林匹克，包括的標識語。

sentences.english: Enjoy the Garden, enhance the Games.
sentences.chinese: 享受東方花園，力促奧林匹克。

sentences.english: He says that a move to the Stade Olimpico would be a dream come true.
sentences.chinese: 他說回到奧林匹克那一天就是他夢想成真的那一天。

sentences.english: A friend suggested I check out the new Olympic Sculpture Park.
sentences.chinese: 一個朋友建議我去見識一下新的奧林匹克雕塑公園。

sentences.english: True believers in the Olympic spirit might balk at this.
sentences.chinese: 真正信仰奧林匹克精神的人會迴避這點。

definition: abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
